definition.value: United States Posɔfese Dwumadibea
Suhyɛn so dwumadie
USPS Nsiesiei a Wɔde Yɛ Adwuma
Odi nkonim: Woayɛ nsakrae wɔ United States Postal Service mu!
Express Mail Amanaman Ntam
Priority Mail Amanaman Ntam
Global Express Guaranteed (Nwoma ne Nea Ɛnyɛ Nwoma) .
Global Express Guaranteed Document a wɔde dii dwuma
Global Express Guaranteed Non-Document Nsusuwii a ɛyɛ ahinanan
Global Express Guaranteed Ɛnyɛ Nwoma a Ɛnyɛ Ahinanan
Nneɛma a Wɔde Di Kan Mail Flat Rate Envelope
Nneɛma a Wɔde Di Kan Mail Flat Rate Box
Express Mail Amanaman Ntam Flat Rate Envelope
Priority Mail Kɛse a Ɛyɛ Flat Rate Adaka
Wiase Nyinaa Express Guaranteed Envelope
First Class Mail Amanaman Ntam Nkrataa
First Class Mail Amanaman Ntam Flats
First Class Mail Amanaman Ntam Nneɛma a Wɔde Kɔma
Priority Mail Ketekete a Ɛyɛ Flat Rate Adaka
Postcard ahorow a wɔde mena
Daa daa
Kakraa
Ne kɛse boro so
Ahinanan a ɛyɛ ahinanan
Ɛnyɛ Ahinanan
Nsakrae a ɛsakra
Ɔdefoɔ ID: Ɛsɛ sɛ USPS de ɔdefoɔ id ne password no email wo. Sɛ ɛnte saa a, kɔ USPS nkyɛn na si wo USPS User ID no so dua. Ɛsɛ sɛ wofrɛ USPS ma wo akontaabu no yɛ adwuma wɔ production servers no so.
Paswɛde:
Zip Code: Zip/Postal code a ɛkyerɛ beae a wofi ase de wo package no.
Ofie Nnwuma:
Amanaman Ntam Nnwuma:
Kɛse: Paw ade kɛse a wotaa de hyɛ nneɛma a woakra afi wo sotɔɔ mu no mu.
Container: Paw container type a wotaa de hyɛ nneɛma a woakra afi wo sotɔɔ mu no mu. USPS de nneɛma a wɔde ahyɛ mu a emu duru bɛyɛ 70 lbs nkutoo bɛma

Machinable:
Wɔkamfo kyerɛ sɛ paw Yiw. Kyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ papa sɛ wode mfiri bedi wo nneɛma a wode bɛmena no ho dwuma anaa. Sɛ woma saa kwan yi yɛ adwuma a, ɛtew ɛka a wɔbɔ wɔ nneɛma a wɔde mena ho no so.
Nsusuwii (L x T x H): .

Dimensions Length:
Sɛ wɔkyekyem pɛpɛɛpɛ a, package dimension ma shipping package.

Dimensions Width:
Sɛ wɔkyekyem pɛpɛɛpɛ a, package dimension ma shipping package.

Dimensions Height:
Sɛ wɔkyekyem pɛpɛɛpɛ a, package dimension ma shipping package.

Girth:
Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuhu wo package no ntwemu a, susuw kwan a atwa package a ɛnyɛ ahinanan no fã a ɛyɛ den sen biara no ho ahyia.

Display Delivery Time:
Wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛ bere a wode bɛmena? (sɛ nhwɛso no, Wɔde mena wɔ nnafua 3 kosi 5 ntam)

Display Delivery Weight:
Wopɛ sɛ wokyerɛ sɛnea wɔde nneɛma mena? (sɛ nhwɛso no, Nneɛma a Wɔde Kɔma no Mu duru : 2.7674 Kg's)

Weight Class:
Fa si nkaribo so.

Length Class:
Wo store no dimension anaa default tenten class.

Tow Kuw:
Sɛ wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wugye tow wɔ ade yi ho a, paw tow kuw.
Beaeɛ:
Nhyehyɛe a Wɔhyehyɛ:
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wunni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa United States Postal Service!
Ɔdefo ID a Wɔhwehwɛ!
Zip Code a Wɔhwehwɛ!
Option for free shipping Yɛsrɛ wo paw ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so apaw ama asɛm bere a teaseɛnam kura nneɛma a wɔde mena kwa nkutoo
Option for free shipping of international parcels Yɛsrɛ sɛ paw ɔkwan a wobɛpaw ama asɛm bere a teaseɛnam kura nneɛma a wɔde mena kwa nkutoo
Debug Logging Gyinabea
